text-editor.editor: Building with our residents is something we keep close to our heart. Getting to know their personal stories and celebrating them together is what makes the care we provide truly personalized.
cholot-title.title:
Thinking about retirement?
Let us be your guide.

From our lovely
community, family & friends.

We’re able to create a family-like atmosphere
for our residents as well.
cholot-team.title: Indah Levi
Adriana Yue
Brenda Wong

cholot-testimonial-two.testi_list.title: Irgan Rogan
cholot-testimonial-two.testi_list.text: My daughter took me to visit senior communities eight years ago and when I walked into it, i knew that I had found my home. Absolutely stunning!

cholot-testimonial-two.testi_list.title: Peggy Brim
cholot-testimonial-two.testi_list.text: My children and I couldn’t be happier with my decision to make this my home! Most importantly, I feel loved here, from the caring staff to friends who look in on me.

cholot-testimonial-two.testi_list.title: Dhea Marisa
cholot-testimonial-two.testi_list.text: We have lived here for five years and the quality, responsiveness and friendliness of the staff can’t be beat. Our overall everyday experiences living makes us happy.

cholot-testimonial-two.testi_list.title: Thyo Septian
cholot-testimonial-two.testi_list.text: The Senior living restaurant offers excellent variety, quality and presentation.  It’s very, very tasteful.  The choices you are given are remarkable!
